nodes.text: Learn to Draw Star Wars Drawing Book & Kit

Learn to Draw Star Wars Drawing Book & Kit is an art set published by Walter Foster Jr. designed to help young artists draw their favorite Star Wars characters, including Chewbacca, Yoda, and Darth Vader. The set includes a forty-page step-by-step tutorial book with illustrations by Grant Gould and descriptive lore of central Star Wars characters. It was published on October 3, 2017.

With the Learn to Draw Star Wars Drawing Book & Kit, young artists can learn to draw their favorite characters from the series, including Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Yoda, Darth Vader, and more. With a 40-page project book, paper pad, drawing pencil, eraser, sharpener, colored pencils, and markers to get you started, the Learn to Draw Star Wars Drawing Book & Kit will provide countless hours of artistic fun for Star Wars fans of all ages.
